show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #28 Brittany Cole Bush "Models Change in Unison"
subtitle: #28 Brittany Cole Bush "Models Change in Unison"
summary:
Cole Bush joins us this week from the Ojai valley in California to visit us about what it's like to run a contract sheep and goat grazing business in the middle of a fairly densely populated areas where not many are accustomed to livestock.

http://brittanycolebush.co/

http://grazingschoolofthewest.com/

https://shepherdesslandl.co/

https://www.instagram.com/shepherdess.land.and.livestock/

http://www.shepherdess.co/
